title: Germanwings Co-Pilot Shines Light On Opaqueness Of Mental Illness
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel talks with Dr. Michael C. Miller, assistant professor of psychiatry at Harvard Medical School, about how someone's deep inner turmoil can remain hidden.
contentencoded:
NPR's Robert Siegel talks with Dr. Michael C. Miller, assistant professor of psychiatry at Harvard Medical School, about how someone's deep inner turmoil can remain hidden from coworkers, neighbors and casual friends.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
